user.title: TfL Local Transport Setup
user.description:
Configure your local transport sensors. The station CRS code is the 3-letter code for your station (e.g., GRP for Grove Park).

API keys are optional but recommended for higher rate limits. Get a Darwin API key from https://raildata.org.uk/ and a TfL API key from https://api-portal.tfl.gov.uk/

error.invalid_crs: Invalid station CRS code. Must be exactly 3 letters.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the API. Please check your configuration.
